title: anyone noticed that not all champions exist as bots?
body:
if you go to costum game , and check the list of bots... there are somewhere of 60 champion bots 
where are the rest? no yasuo,zed,teemo,kled,camille etc.. bots 
why?

replies.body: Pfft, whaddaya talkin about? Theres bots for all the champions right now! Kappa

In the case of Kled and Camille, Keep in mind that these bots are designed based on real players. And it's possible that they don't have enough data on the newer champions. Also, the AI for each champion may have to be written by hand, meaning that it simply takes time for Riot to actually pump these bots out.

While there are champions that don't have bots at all (like Kled and Camille), some champions do exist as bots, but they're not available for custom games. Yasuo and Teemo are both examples of that, you can encounter them in Coop but not in customs. Same with Jinx btw.
Because you have to write the AI for a bot based on it's kit so each bot has to have a unique AI written for it.
